item.description: Book made out of human flesh found by [[Naberus]] One shall come and 3 shall hide and all dwarves shall kneel when she does arise._ Beware the fox of pure intention, you will be betrayed. Though he knows not the darkness his actions serve._ The wolf shall return and with him rip the realm atwain. Two must become one or else one shall become two.
[[Daria]]’s weapon. Usually surrounded by maddening mists of red.

Bordered by a ravine. Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead? A vengeful paladin. But the Wolfkin are fighting to get the country back

Innadel Churches Large Church to the [[Eldath]] in the center of a farming town Taverns The Boil and Youth Locations Badger Hill Cute little hillside with a taxidermy badger outside owner is unknown Events Hostage situation of the Church

Gem of Aresia Taverns The golden lion - where we met raffles - posh - Charity - They have coconut rum from [[Rauthei]] from a rabbit kin Shops The Warm Leg - Gnome owned

List of Memes Sexy Ham. Illusion used by a legendary hedgehog bard to distract animals. “Does a x hit” - Used by [[Geralt of Rivania]] whenever he rolled a “2” and it came out as 30 to hit. But but but what about the accent
Best Adventures ever…. NO QUESTION Active Members: [[Qidan]] [[Daria]] [[Winter]] [[Archibald]] Inactive Members: [[Mardred Blutgard]] [[Geralt of Rivania]] [[Blue]] [[Sigma]] [[Naberus]]

A smiling Octopus Tattoo of initially found on the bodies of some hired mercenaries in [[Innadel]]. Later it was discovered that [[Winter]] also has the same tattoo on their back. Winter Quotes “We were a family” “I just went North to do some recon” [[Innadel]] - A number of lads travelling through has a octopus tattoo

Pibbles Fey Creature - Adorable Appearance Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help Events Feyrealm an escort mission with a group of hedgehogs to a local village and defended them against some blink dogs. The party then gave Pibbles alot of gold and suggested him to the local Authority that a life of politics may suit him. For which he ditched his counterparts (It’s ok they robbed the party after in the Hedgeshot) Water realm, Pibbles is now the advisor to a Fayreleam’s diplomat, who under the control of a mind flayer murders them with cold blood.
Mushoom being. Used to hang around corpses of dark rituals Believed to be a friend of Qidan. Likely a stoner vision or imaginary friend. Probably not real…

Class: Eldrich Knight - Warforge Obsessed with dick Believes he is still an elf

Class - Spore Druid From - [[Ofheise]] Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of [[Ofheise]] was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation. Qidan was cast out at 14 left as a Lonely teenage firbolg outside the city of the elves. Qidan was picked up/hoodwinked by Saraki and used to dispose of bodies of failed rituals for [[Lolth]].
PLEASE FORGIVE MY SPELLING Help to how to use Obsidian https://help.obsidian.md/Start+here

Session 1 [[Innadel]] or [[Leradel]] Arrived at [[Innadel]] Met [[Breeze]] Went to the local tavern and question Breeze who was suspicious Archie notices guards outside the church Qidan scouts as a Bat We go and investigate FOR NO REASON EXCEPT NOSY Hostage situation Big fight Find letter with Black Seal with a monkey on From [[The Syndicate]] initiating the church into the fold Told to meet at [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] Go to [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] Get trapped by [[Lady Xiao]] CLIFFHANGER

Session 2 [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] mages start filling the holes with CloudKill Rescue the hippogriffs and [[Percival]] moonfluff beaky prometheus cloudfleather Big battle on Badger Hill On the bodies found necklace diamond shape green gem in the center used for spell channeling. Archibald maims [[La Qua]] La Qua I am just following orders “You were asking questions about where she is from” RE: [[Lady Xiao]] If you take me with you I will get you into her Mansion We kill him

Fang - used crystal, lasted for a week, but wolfkin had gone when he had got back Reigning lady of Mitts High tea society fleeing - covered in dust - to the south Ghost rebellion - mousekin and wolfkin kicked out - attempting to retake the city. An army (all) led by General Howlington I ARRIVED LATE Travelling to [[Ofheise]] On travelling we view a tear caused by the multi fang Fangs mom is at [[Ghost]] ready to attack [[Qidan]] dreams of a woman in all red who attempts to attack him Arrive at [[Ofheise]] Buys some shoes Go to the local tavern to find out about [[Lady Xiao]] Talks about [[Rauthei]] and a delivery from a rabbit person Archi got a tattoo Went to the stables Daria made the stable boy Qidan made friends with the horse Horse info - [[Lady Xiao]] has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items Fight on the bridge against zombies Met [[Morie Destroyer of Worlds]] which can talk

Unknowns Black Seal with a monkey on the letter from the church in [[Innadel]] SOLVED - [[Lady Xiao]] seal Octopus Tattoo, [[Winter]] has a Octopus tattoo same as the guards mercanarys from [[Innadel]]
